name: Shell Textile Needle Oil S2 M 32

globalDocs.name: Textile Needle Oil S2 M 32 EN TDG V1.0 27-Jun-2017

localDocs.name: Textile Needle Oil S2 M 32 Germany EN 140001492039 EHS V1.2 06-JUL-2023
Textile Needle Oil S2 M 32 Germany DE 140001492039 EHS V1.2 06-JUL-2023

marketing: Shell Textile Needle Oil S2 M is a fully scourable low viscosity textile machinery lubricant specially developed for lubrication of the needle mechanisms of flat and circular bed knitting and weaving machines. It is based on highly refined mineral oils and contains additives to resist oil fling off, minimise wear and to provide high levels of corrosion protection.
